009package Ch26_MSER;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.ImageStack;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.mser.MserData;
018import imagingbook.common.mser.components.Component;
019import imagingbook.common.mser.components.ComponentTree;
020import imagingbook.common.mser.components.ComponentTree.Method;
021import imagingbook.common.mser.components.PixelMap.Pixel;
022
023/**
024 * Creates the component tree of the current image (choose from 2 different methods)
025 * and reconstructs the associated threshold stack.
026 * This must be the same as the one produced by plugin 'Show_Threshold_Stack'.
027 * 
028 * @author WB (2021)
029 *
030 */
031public class Show_ComponentTree_Stack implements PlugInFilter {
032        
033        static Method method = Method.LinearTime;
034
035        @Override
036        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
037                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
038        }
039        
040        @Override
041        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
042                if (!getUserInput()) {
043                        return;
044                }
045                
046                ComponentTree<MserData> compTree = ComponentTree.from((ByteProcessor) ip, method);
047                
048                ImageStack compStack = makeComponentStack(compTree, ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
049                ImagePlus stackIm = new ImagePlus("Component Tree Stack - " + method.name(), compStack);
050                stackIm.show();
051//              GuiTools.zoomExact(stackIm, 16);
052        }
053        
054        private boolean getUserInput() {
055                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Settings");
056                gd.addEnumChoice("component tree method", method);
057
058                gd.showDialog();
059                if (gd.wasCanceled())
060                        return false;
061
062                method = gd.getNextEnumChoice(Method.class);
063                return true;
064        }
065        
066        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
067        
068        private ImageStack makeComponentStack(ComponentTree<?> rt, int width, int height) {
069                //IJ.log("makeComponentStack...");
070                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(width, height);
071                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
072                        ByteProcessor bp = new ByteProcessor(width, height);
073                        fillComponentImage(rt, bp, level);
074                        stack.addSlice("Level " + level, bp);
075                }
076                //IJ.log("makeComponentStack done.");
077                return stack;
078        }
079        
080        /**
081         * Creates a thresholded image with positions set
082         * if pixelvalue <= level.
083         * @param level
084         * @return
085         */
086        private void fillComponentImage(ComponentTree<?> rt, ByteProcessor bp, int level) {
087                //IJ.log("    makeComponentImage level="+level);
088                //ByteProcessor bp = new ByteProcessor(width, height);
089                bp.setValue(255); 
090                bp.fill();
091                for (Component<?> c : rt.getComponents()) {
092                        if (c.getLevel() <= level) {
093                                //IJ.log("    level="+level + "  painting " + c.toString());
094                                for (Pixel p : c.getLocalPixels()) {
095                                        bp.set(p.x, p.y, 0);
096                                }
097                        }
098                }
099        }
100        
101}
